name: Dolabra
short_description: The purpose of the Dolabra project is to provide a Free file splitting and joining utility, which will appeal to users of proprietary software, as well as to the Open Source community.  Currently, a GTK interface is under development.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
